DOC.brief_summary: This study will determine rates of first pass success without hypoxemia in emergency department intubations with and without the use of apneic oxygenation by nasal cannula.
DOC.brief_title: Utah Study Evaluating Apneic Oxygenation for Emergency Department Intubation
DOC.criteria: Patients requiring emergent Rapid Sequence or Delayed Sequence endotracheal intubation with administration of a neuromuscular blocker (Succinylcholine, Rocuronium) Known prisoners Patients in cardiac arrest Patients who are intubated without the use of neuromuscular blockade (i.e., cardiac arrest, awake intubation).
